Challenge

Cartons

We are dedicated to providing the highest quality components in the industry. Our entire workforce has annual cGMP training and adheres to strict Standard Operating Procedures in every part of our process. Whatâ€™s more, all of our facilities are ISO certified; meeting both North American and European standards.

Challenge

Cartons

Challenge

Quality

We specialize in efficiently producing low-to-medium carton runs using digital printing technology from just a few dozen to a few thousand, delivering them to you on a Just in Time basis. For larger runs, we have state-of-the-art, multicolor offset printing equipment that can produce high-volume carton orders most efficiently.

Challenge

Time

Over 100 pharmaceutical manufacturers worldwide trust us to produce their labels, inserts, folding cartons and other packaging components. Our Urgent Response Team enables us to complete new product launches within 24 hours or less.

Challenge

Solutions

Our experts will take your packaging wants and convert them into real solutions that work on your lines, from finding ways to give you more real estate on your components to ensuring that your packaging lines run smoothly. Utilizing multiple printing technologies, we offer solutions using every technology. For example, we entered the digital market early and this allows us to include dynamic information on each printed label.

Challenge

Technology

We combine software and cloud-based elements developed by our in-house computer engineers. From our extensive IT infrastructure and vision systems that monitor Quality to our state-of-the-art printing and finishing equipment, we are the technological leader in our industry, equipment that can produce high-volume carton orders most efficiently.

Challenge

Innovation

We perfectly blend a graphic arts tradition with technological innovation. Our engineers have specialized degrees in such areas as paper coating formulation and ink-media interactions which helps you get the right design that works, BEFORE it hits the packaging line.

We fulfill orders of any quantity and number of colors, efficiently and cost-effectively. Our custom designed offset presses are ideally suited for producing the new, large-format leaflets and Med Guides.

Always New Products

We combine the strength of over 100 years of experience and knowledge as a technological innovator. Our full-time Technical Development Team is dedicated to providing the most innovative solutions using our state-of-the-art equipment. From Large Format leaflets, labels and ECLs to pouches, cartons and booklets, we can provide a one-stop shop for your packaging needs.

Security Features

Challenge

Security Features

We have become the de facto leader in designing and producing security packaging. By layering an array of security features into your healthcare packaging components, we provide a defense mechanism against counterfeiting and assist in your brand authentication efforts.
